post.text:
DON'T LET HER FOOL US AGAIN.
#DangerousHillary

comment.author: Zachary
comment.text: I've been reading a lot of post today on other sites, Hillary is being played a victim, Trump needs to focus on what he can and will do for Americans, she is going up in polls, Trump, no one cares about Billy's Willy any longer, a lot of people may turn to you knowing your dream for us, you Rock when you are Talking about your Plans!

replies.author: Alexander
replies.text: We are very afraid of the stalking sexual predator Trump. I thank God every day that Donald's supporters are in the minority. Here are the predictions by state as of today http://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/2016-election-forecast/

replies.author: Shyanne
replies.text: You know what. I don't believe those polls. I think he will win in a landslide. The news stations are all owned by the democrats and they are the only ones who are polled. Has anyone you know ever been polled. I think they lie so they hope we all stay home cause we don't have a chance. Not gonna happen. Everyone stay strong for TRUMP

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: Trump has no actual ideas. If hating Clinton qualified him to be president then he'd be golden...it doesn't, and unfortunately for him that's all he's got.

replies.author: Daryian
replies.text: Zachary yes he needs to focus on the leak emails
